properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands; East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island; Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10 NM; Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands; Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 1 at 5:50PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
A large and very long period west to northwest swell will bring
an extended period of hazardous seas to the coastal waters through
late this week. Harbor entrances could be affected between
Wednesday and Thursday, including Morro Bay.

These conditions have a history of capsizing vessels of various
sizes resulting in serious injury or death, even to the most
experienced mariners. Mariners are urged to determine the safety
of harbor entrances. For more information, contact the local
harbor patrol or coast guard station...and continue to monitor
NOAA Weather Radio for the latest weather information.

NWSheadline: LARGE LONG PERIOD WESTERLY SWELL TO MOVE THROUGH THE COASTAL WATERS THROUGH FRIDAY
